author: COMSOL
description: This model demonstrates an integrated structural-thermal-optical performance (STOP) analysis of an optical system. The Petzval Lens STOP analysis tutorial, in which the lens and barrel assembly are subjected to a single isothermal temperature, is used as the basis for this model. A parametric sweep over a range of uniform temperatures is performed and the location of the best focus image plane is determined.
label: petzval_lens_stop_analysis_isothermal_sweep.mph
name: root

commentsinfile
settings.value:
Spherical Lens 3D

Spherical lens with either concave or convex surfaces. The lens surface diameters can be smaller than the outer diameter. Clear apertures which are smaller than the lens surface diameters can be specified.

settings.name: commentsinfile
settings.value:
Circular Planar Annulus

Circular planar annulus with negligible thickness.

settings.name: commentsinfile
settings.value:
Rectangular Planar Annulus

Rectangular planar annulus with negligible thickness.
